A: 1. A home is a place where members of a family _ (a) work (b) live (c) play
2. A house is a building which is the _ for a family (a) shelter (b) home (c) office
3. The living room is where we entertain _ (a) pets (b) visitors (c) plants
4. We eat in the _ room (a) living (b) dining (c) bed
5. Food is prepared in the _ (a) bedroom (b) bathroom (c) kitchen
6. We use the toilet to _ or defecate (a) sleep (b) urinate (c) eat
7. A bed is found in the _ (a) kitchen (b) bedroom (c) dining room
8. A gas cooker is an item found in the _ (a) bathroom (b) kitchen (c) living room
9. A sink is found in the bathroom and _ (a) kitchen (b) toilet (c) bedroom
10. Which of these is a type of toilet? (a) Table toilet (b) Hole toilet (c) Chair toilet
11. A toilet must have _ and water (a) sand (b) bucket (c) food
12. We should flush the toilet after _ (a) eating (b) use (c) sleeping
13. Dirt are pieces of _ which litter our surroundings (a) gold (b) refuse (c) toys
14. Which of these is a type of dirt? (a) Clean water (b) Leaves (c) New clothes
15. Good feeding habits mean what you are allowed to do before, during and after _ (a) playing (b) eating (c) sleeping
16. We should wash our hands _ and after eating (a) during (b) before (c) never
17. Land is the part of the earth's surface covered with _ (a) water (b) air (c) soil
18. A land with rocks is called _ land (a) swampy (b) dry (c) rocky
19. The sun rises in the _ (a) evening (b) morning (c) night
20. Energy from the sun is called _ energy (a) wind (b) solar (c) water
B: 1. What is the room where we sleep? _________
2. What is used to urinate or defecate? _________
3. What is a land with much water called? _________
4. What is the energy from the sun called? _________
5. What should you use to wash your hands after using the toilet? _________
C: 2. Name two items found in a kitchen.
3. State two proper ways to use a toilet.
5. Give two uses of the sun.
